array.name: topic1
array.item: This application is a clock. But it is not a common clock, it shows Japanese Traditional Time instead.

array.name: topic2
array.item: The single most important information this application needs is your location. Once that is set up you don\'t have to update it unless you\'re moving to a different city. The accuracy within several kilometers is enough assuming the rounding errors.

array.name: topic3
array.item: This application is completely open-source. You can find everything on github.
